messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. You are connected with Vivian and a new app appears in which you can connect to anyone only once. From Vivian, what is the connection path that yields the most reward? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Connect with Vivian (since I am already connected to Vivian)
Step 2: Connect with Salma, Shanshan, or Vadim (as they are all connected to Vivian)
Step 3: Connect with the remaining two from Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim (as they are all connected to each other)
Step 4: Connect with Noah (as he is connected to Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim)
Step 5: Connect with Anisha (as she is connected to Noah)
Step 6: Connect with Abdul, Durga, or Ajit (as they are all connected to Anisha)
Step 7: Connect with the remaining two from Abdul, Durga, and Ajit (as they are all connected to each other)
Step 8: Connect with Pierre (as he is connected to Abdul, Durga, and Ajit)
Step 9: Connect with Soheil (as he is connected to Pierre)
Step 10: Connect with Solomon, Gongxue, or Alice (as they are all connected to Soheil)
Step 11: Connect with the remaining two from Solomon, Gongxue, and Alice (as they are all connected to each other)

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Noah, Anisha, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Pierre, Soheil, Solomon, Gongxue, Alice

teleShortcut.parsed_response: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Noah, Anisha, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Pierre, Soheil, Solomon, Gongxue, Alice
